mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, content, writer, views ) values( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, writer, views, date_format(regist_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') regist_datetime, date_format(modify_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') modify_datetime FROM board WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modify_datetime = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, writer, views, date_format(regist_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') regist_datetime, date_format(modify_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') modify_datetime FROM board ORDER BY id LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0

SELECT id, title, content, writer, views, date_format(regist_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') regist_datetime, date_format(modify_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') modify_datetime FROM ( SELECT * FROM board WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') writer LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') 1=1 ) A ORDER BY regist_datetime DESC, id DESC LIMIT #{pageAmount} OFFSET #{startBoardNum}
